availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Lorenzo Dow Croninger (Covington, Kentucky, master printer)

body.p: Covington, Kentucky, printer. Ohio native. Married to Sarah A. Hoyt Croninger in Kenton County, Kentucky, on November 8, 1855. Father of Sallie Croninger and Clara Croninger. Master printer in Covington in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington, Ward 1, p. 29.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994043, Kenton County Marriages, p. 3-4.
"Lorenzo D. Croninger (1827-1898)," Find A Grave, Memorial #132909394, accessed May 8, 2018, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/132909394.
